class="bullet"></span> <span class="bullet"></span> <span class="bullet"></span> </div> <h3>WeDeploy™ CLI</h3> </div> <div class="cli__terminal flex-column-left-top"> <div class="terminal-content"> <p>Available Commands:</p> <p class="no-margin"> <span class="one">create</span> <span class="two">Creates a project or container;</span> </p> <p> <span class="one">deploy</span> <span class="two">Deploys current project or container;</span> </p> <p class="no-margin"><strong>You</strong> at <strong>WeDeploy</strong> in <strong>~</strong></p> <p>$ <strong>we</strong> deploy |</p> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div id="languages" > <div class="filled"> <div class="filled-center flex-center-top"> <div class="lang-item flex-center-center"> <div class="lang lang--javascript"> <img src="images/home/languages/logo_js.png" /> </div> </div> <div class="lang-item flex-center-center"> <div class="lang lang--javascript"> <img src="images/home/languages/logo_php.png" /> </div> </div> <div class="lang-item solo flex-center-center"> <div class="lang lang--java"> <img src="images/home/languages/logo_java.png" /> </div> </div> <div class="lang-item flex-center-center"> <div class="lang lang--python"> <img src="images/home/languages/logo_python.png" /> </div> </div> <div class="lang-item flex-center-center"> <div class="lang lang--ruby"> <img src="images/home/languages/logo_ruby.png" /> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div id="view-3__1"> <div class="container-wedeploy"> <div class="info-box"> <div class="info-box__container"> <p>Microservices</p> <h3>Built-in APIs that can help you create modern apps faster.</h3> <p>We provide a set of ready-to-use services that enables you to store data in the cloud, search and stream content in realtime, authenticate users, send emails to your users, and so on.</p> </div> </div> <div class="bg-text"> <div class="bg-text__solid"></div> <div class="bg-text__gradient"></div> </div> <div class="info-img"></div> </div> </div> <div id="view-3__2"> <div class="container-wedeploy"> <div class="info-box"> <div class="info-box__container flex-center-top"> <p>Containers</p> <h3>Your favorite stack on the cloud in just few clicks.</h3> <p>Choose between dozens of languages, frameworks, or entire application stacks. Launch production-ready environments in a matter of minutes.</p> </div> </div> <div class="bg-text"> <div class="bg-text__solid"></div> <div class="bg-text__gradient"></div> </div> <div class="info-img"></div> </div> </div> <div id="view-4"> <div class="container-wedeploy"> <div id="view-4__giant" class="giant"> <span>We</span> </div> <div class="text-center"> <h2>Carefully designed features</h2> </div> <div class="text-center"> <h4>Empowering you to build amazing apps.</h4> </div> <ul id="features-container" class="flex-center-top"> <!-- first --> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-data" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_data.svg" /> </div> <div class="we-container"> <div class="we flex-center-center"> <span>We</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>WeDeploy™ Data</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Store data securely with a NoSQL cloud database. Make complex queries instantly and consume information in real-time.</p> </div> </div> </li> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-users" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_users.svg" /> </div> <div class="we-container"> <div class="we flex-center-center"> <span>We</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>WeDeploy™ Users</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Avoid the headache of operating your own user management system. Authenticate users in few lines of code using our SDKs.</p> </div> </div> </li> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-cloud" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_cloud.svg" /> </div> <div class="we-container"> <div class="we flex-center-center"> <span>We</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>WeDeploy™ Hosting</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Deliver HTML, CSS, JS, and any kind of static files using a powerful static hosting. It's super fast and will save you a lot of time.</p> </div> </div> </li> <!-- second --> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-terminal" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_terminal.svg" /> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>Command Line Tool</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>We designed a CLI that seamlessly integrates into your workflow. Almost everything you can do from the dashboard can also be done from your terminal.</p> </div> </div> </li> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-servers" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_servers.svg" /> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>Load Balancer</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Automagically distribute incoming traffic across multiple instances without the client ever knowing about the internal separation of containers.</p> </div> </div> </li> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-velocimeter" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_velocimeter.svg" /> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>High Availability</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Don't worry about having your app taken offline during deployment of the new code. Push updates or restart your containers with zero downtime.</p> </div> </div> </li> <!-- third --> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-file" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_file.svg" /> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>Log Management</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Detect and diagnose an error from your terminal or from the dashboard. Watch logs in realtime and find the specific cause, fast.</p> </div> </div> </li> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-heart" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_heart.svg" /> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>Health Checks</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Be the first one to know when something wrong happens. Monitor the status and control the lifecycle of your containers very easily.</p> </div> </div> </li> <li class="feature"> <div class="feature__box text-center"> <div class="box__badge-container"> <div id="badge-globe" class="badge flex-center-center"> <img src="images/home/icons_view_2/icon_globe.svg" /> </div> </div> <div class="feature__title"> <h3>Custom Domains</h3> </div> <div class="feature__description"> <p>Every project is accessible via a wedeploy.io subdomain. We know that's not enough for apps in production, that's why you can set up your own custom domains.</p> </div> </div> </li> </ul> </div> </div> <div id="view-6" class="text-center"> <div id="view-6__giant" class="giant"> <span id="giant__deploy">Deploy</span> </div> <div class="info"> <div class="info__title"> <h2>We can't wait to see what you're going to build.</h2> </div> <div class="info__button"> <button class="open-modal btn btn-accent btn-block">Request an Invite</button> </div> <div class="info__question"> <h5>Have a question?
